original_title: 人 妻 ナ ー ス 三 日 三 晩 の 恋
overview: Shoko, a married woman, works in a hospital as a nurse.  One day, one of the patients happens to meet an old boyfriend, Tagawa.  Shoko learned from her nurse that Tagawa is terminal cancer and can only live for 3 months.  However, I couldn't tell Tagawa, so I don't know.  The hospital says to give up treatment and just go home.  She makes a decision because she wants to do something for Tagawa ...
title: Married Nurse - Soft Skin Dedication
